sentences.en: BE inset China at the south of a green bright pearl.
sentences.cn: 是镶嵌在南中国的一颗绿色明珠.

sentences.en: FIG . 2 also shows a detailed inset of the inter - slot period .
sentences.cn: 图2还显示出时隙 间隔期间 的详细插图.

sentences.en: For an explanationof the symbols see the key , inset left.
sentences.cn: 有关各符号的意义请见左边附表.

sentences.en: For the Shetland Islands, see inset.
sentences.cn: 关于设得兰群岛，见小地图。

sentences.en: Inset the key card for electricity.
sentences.cn: 插入钥匙板,房间就有电了.

sentences.en: Inset: Melbourne across Port Phillip Bay.
sentences.cn: 插图: 从菲利普湾港看墨尔本城.
插图: 从威廉姆斯镇看墨尔本城.

sentences.en: Inset: the Yarra River and the city.
sentences.cn: 插图: 耶那河与墨尔本城.

sentences.en: Make sure your picture matches the inset window, especially along the edges.
sentences.cn: 确保您的图像与嵌入窗口相匹配, 特别是边缘.

sentences.en: Now selects the front polygon and inset it.
sentences.cn: 现在选择前面的多边形,然后向内缩进.

sentences.en: Our new street plan of the city is inset in a corner of their area map.
sentences.cn: 他们的地区地图一角插入了我们为这座城市新绘的街道图.

sentences.en: Some may have dark lines inset into these colors, like tiger stripes.
sentences.cn: 有些会有些深色的线条在这些颜色里, 看起来像是老虎的纹路.

sentences.en: The inset demonstrates a typical giant cell with a round, pink intracytoplasmic inclusion.
sentences.cn: 插图显示典型的巨细胞,圆形, 有粉红色胞质包涵体.

sentences.en: The venture earned Mr Taylor (inset) millions of dollars.
sentences.cn: 这项风险投资使泰勒先生(见小图)赚了数百万美元。

sentences.en: The whole line decoration inset a small circle of 15 green loose stones slice.
sentences.cn: 整个纹饰镶嵌了十五个绿松石小圆片.

sentences.en: Which letter is a useful inset?

trans.tran_cn: 嵌入，插入（作为装饰等）,（在大图片、地图等中）套印（小图）
trans.tran_en: if something is inset with decorations or jewels, they are fixed into or on its surface
